Subject: Riptide: A new Maximal

A stasis pod was seen from the sky.  It belonged to a transformer named
Riptide.  Originally a Maximal, Riptide was framed by a long time enemy
because of jelousy of his enormous power.  The Cybertron Committee of
Justice sentenced Riptide to be cast out of Cybertronian space
traveling in a stasis pod(much like Rampage).  While traveling in the
space/time continueum, his pod crashed on Prehistoric Earth.  When he
awakened he had a new Pirahnna body and no memories of what happened on
Cybertron or what and where Cybertron is.  Not even knowing what
faction he belonged to, he fled to the waters where he tries to find
out who/what/when/where he is and how he got here...
Ooc: By the way, he is a Maximal still.
Riptide
